main_definition: Not having the capability or authority to do something; unable to perform an action or task.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Lacking physical, mental, or emotional capacity to do something
meanings_and_examples.example: After running a marathon, he was unable to lift his heavy suitcase.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not having the power or legal authority to make decisions or take actions
meanings_and_examples.example: The interns were unable to approve any budget changes without consulting their supervisors.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Incapable of achieving a goal due to various obstacles or limitations
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite her best efforts, she was unable to complete the project on time because of unforeseen issues.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not able to do something owing to lack of resources or support
meanings_and_examples.example: The small business owners were unable to expand their operations due to limited funding.
